Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Context
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. See migration guide.
    play.mvc.Http.Context.Implicit
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Response
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead which has methods to add headers and cookies.
    play.mvc.Http.WrappedContext
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. See migration guide.
    play.db.jpa.JPAEntityManagerContext
    Use a dependency injected JPAApi instance here, since 2.7.0
    play.Logger
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use slf4j directly. For more details see https://github.com/playframework/playframework/issues/1669
    play.db.jpa.TransactionalAction
    Use a dependency injected JPAApi instance here, since 2.7.0
    play.data.validation.ValidatorProvider
    Deprecated since 2.7.0. Use ValidatorFactoryProvider instead.
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    play.db.jpa.Transactional
    Use a dependency injected JPAApi instance here, since 2.7.0
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Context.args
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use request attributes instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Context.current
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use a request instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Session.isDirty
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0.
    play.mvc.Http.Flash.isDirty
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Context._requestHeader()
    Use Http.Context.request().asScala() instead. Since 2.7.0.
    play.mvc.Http.WrappedContext._requestHeader()
    play.data.Form.allErrors()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Method has been renamed to Form.errors().
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asByteArray()
    Use response.getBodyAsBytes().toArray()
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asJson()
    Use response.getBody(json())
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asXml()
    Use response.getBody(xml())
    play.data.DynamicForm.bind(JsonNode, String...)
    play.data.Form.bind(JsonNode, String...)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Form.bind(Lang, TypedMap, JsonNode, String...) instead.
    play.data.DynamicForm.bind(Map<String, String>, String...)
    play.data.Form.bind(Map<String, String>, String...)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Form.bind(Lang, TypedMap, Map, String...) instead.
    play.data.DynamicForm.bindFromRequest(Map<String, String[]>, String...)
    play.data.Form.bindFromRequest(Map<String, String[]>, String...)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Form.bindFromRequestData(Lang, TypedMap, Map, String...) instead.
    play.data.DynamicForm.bindFromRequest(String...)
    play.data.Form.bindFromRequest(String...)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Form.bindFromRequest(Http.Request, String...) instead.
    play.mvc.Action.call(Http.Context)
    Since 2.7.0. Use #call(Request) instead. Please see the migration guide for more details.

    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.setLang(Result, Lang) or Result.withLang(Lang, MessagesApi).

    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.setLang(Result, Lang).

    play.mvc.Http.WrappedContext.changeLang(String)

  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Context(Long, RequestHeader, Http.Request, Http.Response, Http.Session, Http.Flash, Map<String, Object>, JavaContextComponents)
    Use #Context(Long, play.api.mvc.RequestHeader, Request, Response, Session, Flash, Map, Lang, JavaContextComponents) instead. Since 2.7.0.
    play.DefaultApplication(Application, Config, Injector)
    Use DefaultApplication.DefaultApplication(play.api.Application, Config, Injector, Environment) instead.
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi(JPAConfig, JPAEntityManagerContext)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use DefaultJPAApi.DefaultJPAApi(JPAConfig) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Flash(int)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Http.Flash will not be a subclass of HashMap in future Play releases.
    play.mvc.Http.Flash(int, float)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Http.Flash will not be a subclass of HashMap in future Play releases.
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.JPAApiProvider(JPAConfig, JPAEntityManagerContext, ApplicationLifecycle, DBApi, Config)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use #JPAApiProvider(JPAConfig, ApplicationLifecycle, DBApi, Config) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.RequestImpl(RequestHeader)
    Since 2.7.0. Use #RequestImpl(play.api.mvc.Request) instead.

    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Http.Session will not be a subclass of HashMap in future Play releases.

    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Http.Session will not be a subclass of HashMap in future Play releases.
